name: Inglorious Baskers
description:
Battle all the lizards on the island for lizard supremacy!

In Inglorious Baskers, you're survival is in a precarious balance! Compete with other lizards for food and basking spots - watch out for predators - be careful you don't get sick. As you survive on lizard isle, you'll learn about how animals need to consider different traits to make sure they can survive.

How long can you survive??
